locations.content: Rothsay Truck Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: $5 shower. Best chocolate milk I‚Äôve had in some time. Parking is free and quite plentiful. Did not eat at cafe for lunch, but might for dinner. Plenty of people eating gear for lunch so must be good. Friendly people!
Great place. Plenty of parking, clean restrooms, Shower and cafe for good food.

Ok just gonna share this. We stop here all the time well today was terrible! We were charged double for a shower! One night was 5 the next night was 10. We didn't get an extra towel or washcloth as requested. The cashiers were very rude to ‚Ä¶
Shower's 5$, lots of different food , restaurant, showers we're hot . Under construction but open enter on the pump ‚õΩ side
Clean faculty and nice staff, shower was nothing to write home about but felt great to be clean

‚Ä¶ watering hole next door to get relaxed at. The store itself is reducing and the quick bite options are more limited now but the fuel price ain't bad. Bathrooms are hit and miss (depends on who is working) and I haven't tried to shower here.

‚Ä¶ It's ok but nothing spectacular. Should be able to get parking spot, long wait for shower so skipped that and food was good, but nothing special, expected better from what the reviews said! I can do better and that's not saying to much üòÜ! ‚Ä¶

Nice little mom&pop type truck stop. Small store but it has everything you need, and pretty decent food from the cafe (though not as good as can be found at the Big Chief). Shower is $5 and quite nice.
Great truck stop! Clean showers ($5 for shower) and friendly personnel! Nice cafe. I would like to come back as soon as possible. Thank you!
The inside was well maintained and organized. The shower rooms were very clean and nice looking. Nice location right off I-94, too.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ üöø Shower was clean with lots of hot water and good water pressure. ‚Ä¶
Fargo is a nice well kept town. This flying j is a nice facility, friendly staff and shower number two was absolutely superb!
It‚Äôs been rebuild recently, plenty of truck parking, shower was clean, good restaurant on site.

Shower cabins need repair, everything is clean, i always like have stops in Pilot/ Flaing J,  but there is nowhere to hang things when need to use shower. The repair is of very poor quality - the management saved on incompetent contractors.

Showers suck. Reserve the shower from the app. Went in with my code. Call did not work. Try to get. Nope. Tried 3 or 4 more times. Nothing. Go to the counter. Friendly lady. Call somebody to assist me. Nobody came. Go wait by the shower. Ki ‚Ä¶

No showers again??? We're out here working in this mess, Hot showers are a necessity but they're closed. So I guess I can go to Loves and PAY for one ü§¶‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è and when the showers are working the water temp on MAX is still cold. Might be okay ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ offers for the most part a clean truck stop. They could do better cleaning around the toilet and if you stop by for a shower I left something in there to see how long it takes someone t o find. Lol the gal that was cleaning the day I was ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ lap, woman‚Äôs restroom was dirty. I‚Äôm absolutely disappointed. Every Flying J/Pilot has a problem - or it is a tight parking or no hot water in a shower or something else. when will you start working for quality and not for quantity????!!!!

‚Ä¶ a bad place, stopped to get food and fuel, found out there was only one person working the Huddle House, a shame. One driver decided to park in a non parking zone just to shower. Lots of parking left but, he decided to park where he wanted.

‚Ä¶ the vision of perfection as the vast majority of people tend to expect of a truck stop. So what?  Available is fuel, food, washroom and shower facilities and overnight parking for free plus whatever else you may possibly need for the trip. ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ very nice, but workers at the cash register are not the nicest. I bought over 50 gallons of fuel but hadn‚Äôt set up my ultra one points pin yet and was rejected a shower. Ended up paying the $16 even though I just fueled and the shower ‚Ä¶
Forget something in the shower very important for me Lary and Josef help me find it Thanks a lot

‚Ä¶ Restaurant inside.....BEST steak (ribeye) that I've had in a long time! Ordered  before shower and it was ready when I got out. AWESOME. Nice showers, steak,potato and salad for 17 bucks... so tender I could cut with a plastic  knife!! Gue ‚Ä¶

Well don't expect a shower because the night shift says they might or might not have hot water and they're full of attitude. Was gonna eat at the restaurant but my question is how can the employees properly sanitize their hands and dishes ‚Ä¶

The kiosk is still broken as of 02/22/21, so if you need to redeem points, check your account, or need a shower, good luck. I hope you have the app. Speaking of which, I tried using the app while inside the store, I got a msg that said, "no ‚Ä¶

Cant even get a free shower when u purchase 50 gal  of fuel anymore unless u have a " card". Bunch of crap. But u can fill out all your life history and personal info on their computer and get a card. No thanks i dont need anymore people to ‚Ä¶
Love this TA....girls are always cleaning especially in the shower area. Everyone is friendly...Stop here once a week, fueling showing and laundry and to see the friendly staff.
Had a great shower, but would have enjoyed my visit more if they had a couch to sit on.

showerReviews.reviewText: I took clean hot shower in this Mooring.  Thank you guys!!! But stupid truck driver removed his rejected product to loves parking property.

‚Ä¶ , but it‚Äôs gonna go back down because they‚Äôre not taking care of it and they hire people who don‚Äôt care and it shows. Shower was dirty hair everywhere pee on the toilet pee on the seat and hair on the counter and in sink, black stuff on the ‚Ä¶
They have 10 empty showers and only using 1 or 2 making folks wait 60 to 90 minutes to shower like no one has anything to do at 1130 at night. Come on love get it together.
Do your job people have schedules to keep. Getting fed up with the shower situation. If people stay in one past 30 minutes extra money credits or points should be deducted from their card

I book a shower my postion or waiting  is 4 after 50 min wait still waiting number is 4.
When i go inside the store all employees are busy playing game in subway area.

The janitor is very uncourteous and unprofessional I was in shower and without knocking came straight inside the shower. I spoke to Alex who claimed to be store manager and he appeared to do nothing about it. Didn‚Äôt even care to apologize. ‚Ä¶

Showers were horrible and looked like they only throw in fresh towels after each use. Shower had no soap, toilet was filthy, sink had hair in it, mirror was so dirty that you couldn't really see a reflection and the floor was sticky (think ‚Ä¶
Waited to all the shower were my be for cleaning tham. On top of that coalition shower ever. In September so far 2000 gallon fuel. Thanks. Don't forget I am on the clock. So thanks

Stopped for a shower. Wasn't clean at all. Glad I brought my own cleaning supplies. Nail clippings and dirt all over the floor. There avg time "cleaning" a shower must be less than a minute the way it looked.

Any time, day or night you'll have a 30-45 min wait for a shower. I fuel here just enough to get somewhere else. Time is money and I can't(won't) wait around for Love's to service their customers properly.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ here as to the other big three in town.  Food line isn‚Äôt the biggest but is adequate.  They are part of the FlyingJ/Pilot rewards so you shower credits are good here.  I used shower 5.  Little compact in there and floor looks like it was ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ down junk and dropped trailers. Literally 10 open spots at 1430 on a weekday. They‚Äôre part of the Pilot/J Franchise (one9), but do not honor shower credits from Pilot/J. Very pathetic food choices available. I‚Äôll use their parking lot, but ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ But the shower had no ventilation and by time you get out of the shower you need another one from sweating to death bc it's so hot from the steam of your shower.  I had to open the door and let the heat out so I could breathe. ‚Ä¶

Although a clean facility, be prepared to pay $15 for a shower. They refused to honor the 9 shower credits shown available on my Pilot/Flying J loyalty card. (I guess I need to stick to actual Pilot/Flying J travel centers in the future)

The shower water kept alternating from hot to cold, on its own, no matter how I adjusted it. Also, I just went in to get my scale tickets and was told by the guy at the counter, "I don't have time to look for it. You will have to come back ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: Great stop for gas, everything a trucker or RV'ER would need. Ice, propane, restroom, shower, air for tires and alot of food items, don't forget the coffee.
‚Ä¶ I came in to purchase a shower. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ had a terrible experience at the Flying J in Alexandria (MN). I booked a shower through the app, and when I checked, the showers were empty but not cleaned. The cleaner (tall Black guy) was outside smoking something weird with his ‚Ä¶
The person who is responsible for showers waits for you after shower and forces you to give them tip. They also listened so loud hip hop music

Place is a joke! Waited an hour for a shower. Only to find out NOBODY was cleaning them and half of them were dirty. 5 people waiting in line! This was at NOON! That is unacceptable!
PLUS!! NO Subway! Yep, that's right closed for the day!
Very clean shower I was very impressed, cashier was extremely friendly, she was a 3rd shift worker, keep up the good work pilot.

‚Ä¶ stop. The women's bathroom toilet sprays you and anything in the stall when you flush. It's a UTI station more than a toilet. If the goal was to sell me a shower it definitely made me want to shower, but not here. Staff were nice enough.
Came here for a shower, and it wasn't even cleaned. Told the person cleaning the showers and they claim it is clean. Look at the pictures of all the limescale building up
‚Ä¶ Good over all but seems like showers haven‚Äôt been cleaned in a very long time ‚Ä¶

Decent place for a Pilot. Kind and friendly people working here. Would not recommend taking a shower here. Shower was clean but had two problems. Water temperature randomly changed to scalding hot and back to normal. Second issue is that ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: Good sized parking lot, 3 semi pumps, 2 one sided diesel island pumps, 6 gas pumps, good food, decent restroom. 1 shower. Decent selection of goods. BIG ENOUGH PARKING FOR TURBINE BLADES!

‚Ä¶ place to stop and grab a bite to eat. Gas is 20 cents more than valley city but in a pinch its a life saver. Excellent for truckers in need of shower. All in all i give it 4 out of 5 stars. The only draw back is sometimes you get a new ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ employees are friendly and will help you if you have a question. Not a typical truckstop, one shower and not open 24 hours but they do have an outhouse in the lot for overnight bathroom needs. Try their scotcharoos, they are great. 5 stars.
Very spacious for trucks with alot of parking. Clean showers and friendly people. Not 24 hrs but all the worth going here. $8 a shower. Good place.
Not bad for middle of nowhere. Have a restaurant open from 6 a.m to 2 p.m . Decent store. Only gave 4 star cause they only have one shower so you have to wait a while if you need one.
Staff was friendly and helpful. Restaurant had closed in the afternoon, couldn't get dinner.  Restrooms and shower were clean along with the store.
Small truck stop, no scale, 1 shower, small restaraunt large parking lot. Open 5am to 12am
Very friendly staff nice clean shower
